#Loading new Libraries for my project
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(NbClust)
library(cluster)
library(clustertend)
library(factoextra)
library(dendextend)
#Reading the Bikevendor data
bikeVendors <- read.csv("bikeVendors.csv")
attach(bikeVendors)
#Checking Variable names
names(bikeVendors)
##97 observations and 35 variables in data, 5 Different variables has been identified 
#Checking for NA data
table(is.na(bikeVendors))
##No Missing Values
#Checking the top and bottom of the Data
head(bikeVendors)
tail(bikeVendors)
#Questions that I setup on this Data
##Maximum price for model
##Minimum Price for model
##Maximum price for category1
##Minimum Price for category1
##Maximum price for category2
##Minimum Price for category2
##Maximum price for frame
##Minimum Price for frame
#Analysis of Data
##Summary of Data
summary(bikeVendors)
#By observing the summary of whole data. 
##Observing indeatil summary of model, category1, category2, frame and price variables 
summary(model)
##97 different models
summary(category1)
##51 Mountain and 46 Road count in category1
summary(category2)
##9 different categories in category2
summary(price)
##Minimum 415 and Maximum 12790 of Price value
##Checking the summary and margin for Price 
quantile(price, seq(0,1,0.1))
##Indeatil summary of quantile price
##barplot
#Plot model vs Price
ggplot(bikeVendors, aes(x = model, y = price)) + geom_boxplot() + coord_flip()
##Not clear because of 97 different models
#Plot category1 vs Price
ggplot(bikeVendors, aes(x = category1, y = price)) + geom_boxplot() + coord_flip()
##Mountain category got extensive range of Price and got highest price
#Plot category1 vs Price
ggplot(bikeVendors, aes(x = category2, y = price)) + geom_boxplot() + coord_flip()
##Top Highest Price for Cross Country Race and Over Mountain, Lowest price is for Sport
#Plot frame vs Price
ggplot(bikeVendors, aes(x = frame, y = price)) + geom_boxplot() + coord_flip()
##Carbon frame got Highest price and Aluminum got lowest price
